title: This has nothing to do with League but...
body:
I want to know what your favorite genre of music is and then what your top 3 favorite songs are because I want to widen my musical horizons and hear new sounds apart from usual sad tracks... and this should be interesting since it's from the LoL community

Ok fine, I will start...my favorite genre is EDM
1. Luma by The M Machine
2. I Remember by Deadmau5 & Kaskade
3. You Were Right by Rufus Du Sol

( I prefer depressing music  - don't ask why )
( ^ _ O )
